thread.title: Russia's economy battles fresh U.S. sanctions

title: Russia's economy battles fresh U.S. sanctions
text:
Russia's economy battles fresh U.S. sanctions Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 01:59 
An escalation in U.S. sanctions against Moscow risks derailing a fragile recovery in Russia's economy, which had just begun to take hold after the Kremlin's last confrontation with the West in 2014, analysts and investors said.   
An escalation in U.S. sanctions against Moscow risks derailing a fragile recovery in Russia's economy, which had just begun to take hold after the Kremlin's last confrontation with the West in 2014, analysts and investors said.  //reut.rs/2qk3dNW
